English.error_repossession: URL does not meet the minimum requirements for repossession!
English.error_association_required: You must be associated with a paste to do this!
English.error_filter: Comment violates this paste's comment filter!
English.error_locked: This paste has been locked by a server administrator.
English.error_invalid_body: Body inputs invalid, missing 1 or more required parameters!
English.error_configuration: Server configuration has disabled this function!
English.error_paste_settings: Paste configuration has disabled this function!
English.error_file_exists: A file with this name already exists!
